Watchers of the technology giant seemed to react mostly positively to news of the leadership shakeup. I think it's a good move. It( the triumvirate management structure) was always one of things that concerned us a little bit, said Jacob Internet Fund portfolio manager Ryan Jacob." CEO title at Google to cofounder Larry Page NEW YORK( CNNMoney)-- Google CEO Eric Schmidt will step down from his role as Google's CEO in April and be replaced by co-founder Larry Page.
